context: I broke a promise to spend time together
letters:
Dear [Son's Name],

I hope this note finds you well, though I know I might not deserve your understanding right now. I want to take a moment to sincerely apologize for breaking my promise to spend time together. I know how much it meant to us both, and I deeply regret letting you down.

Life sometimes has a way of overwhelming us, pulling our attention in directions we didn’t intend to go. But that’s no excuse for not being there for you when I promised I would. You are incredibly important to me, and I hate that I missed the chance to connect and create memories with you.

I want you to know that it wasn’t my intention to make you feel unvalued or ignored. You deserve my full attention and commitment, and I acknowledge that I fell short this time. I am truly sorry for any disappointment I caused you.

Please know that I am working on making more time for us and ensuring that I keep my promises in the future. I hope you can forgive me for this mistake, and we can find an opportunity to spend time together soon. 

Thank you for being such an understanding and patient son. I love you dearly and am committed to making it right.

With all my love,

[Your Name]
